ssot__User__dlm.name: User
ssot__User__dlm.description: The User DMO represents an account, a person, or a machine that can log in and use the deployed software system.

ssot__AboutMe__c.description: The about me information for the user.

ssot__AccountId__c.description: A reference ID to the account for the user.

ssot__BadgeText__c.description: The badge text for the user.

ssot__CallCenterId__c.description: A reference ID to the call center for the user.

ssot__CommunityNickname__c.description: The community nickname for the user.

ssot__CompanyName__c.description: The company name for the user.

ssot__ContactId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact for the user.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId___c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DelegatedApproverId__c.description: A reference ID to the delegated approver for the user.

ssot__Email__c.description: The email address for the user.

ssot__EmailEncodingKey__c.description: The email encoding key for the user.

ssot__EmailSignature__c.description: The email signature for the user.

ssot__Extension__c.description: The phone extension for the user.

ssot__FirstName__c.description: The first name for the user.

ssot__ForecastEnabled__c.description: An indicator if the forecast for the user is enabled.

ssot__FullName__c.description: The full name for the user.

ssot__FullPhotoUrl__c.description: The full photo URL for the user.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the user.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the record is active.

ssot__LastLoginDate__c.description: The date when the user last logged in.

ssot__LastName__c.description: The last name for the user.

ssot__LastPasswordChangeDate__c.description: The date when the user’s password was last changed.

ssot__Offline PdaTrialExpirationDate__c.description: The date when the user’s offline PDA trial expires.

ssot__Offline TrialExpirationDate__c.description: The date when the user’s offline trial expires.

ssot__ReceivesAdminInfoEmails__c.description: An indicator if the user receives admin information emails.

ssot__ReceivesInfoEmails__c.description: An indicator if the user receives information emails.

ssot__SenderName__c.description: The sender name for the user.

ssot__SmallPhotUrl__c.description: The small photo URL for the user.

ssot__StayInTouchNote__c.description: The text for the user’s stay in touch message.

ssot__StayInTouchSignature__c.description: The signature for the user’s stay in touch message.

ssot__StayInTouchSubject__c.description: The subject for the user’s stay in touch message.

ssot__UserGroupId__c.description: A reference ID to the user group for the user.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the user DMO.
